languages.text: "Благодаря вашей предшественнице. Я прибыл в Простор по зову конклава флота Осознание, чтобы разобраться с ересью архимагоса Амарната. Но очень быстро понял, что проблемы Простора Коронус гораздо масштабнее, чем какая-то техноересь. Невиданный разгул пиратства, вопиющая контрабанда ксеноартефактов, непокорные и буйные Вольные Торговцы, крепнущий культ Губительных сил — и все это на территории, которую почитают своим доменом друкари".

"Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."
languages.original_text: "Благодаря вашей предшественнице. Я прибыл в Простор по зову конклава флота Осознание, чтобы разобраться с ересью архимагоса Амарната. Но очень быстро понял, что проблемы Простора Коронус гораздо масштабнее, чем какая-то техноересь. Невиданный разгул пиратства, вопиющая контрабанда ксеноартефактов, непокорные и буйные Вольные Торговцы, крепнущий культ Губительных сил — и все это на территории, которую почитают своим доменом друкари".

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I had arrived at the Expanse by the call of the Cognisance Fleet conclave, to deal with the Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to a realization that the Koronus Expanse's problems run much deeper than some tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running rampant, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, the rebellious and wild Rogue Traders, and the growing Ruinous Powers cult — all this on the territory that the Aeldari consider their domain."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I had arrived at the Expanse by the call of the Cognisance Fleet conclave, to deal with the Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to a realization that the Koronus Expanse's problems run much deeper than some tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running rampant, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, the rebellious and wild Rogue Traders, and the growing Ruinous Powers cult — all this on the territory that the Aeldari consider their domain."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, the rebellious and wild Rogue Traders, and the growing Ruinous Powers cult—all this in the land that the Drukhari consider their domain."

But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and a growing Ruinous Powers cult — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Grâce à votre prédécesseure. J'étais venu dans les Étendues de Koronus à la demande de la Flotte de la Connaissance pour mettre fin à l'hérésie de l'archimagos Amarnat. Toutefois, j'ai vite réalisé que les problèmes du secteur ne venaient pas de la technohérésie, mais avaient des causes bien plus profondes. La piraterie qui a pris une ampleur sans précédent, la contrebande flagrante de xéno-artefacts, des libres-marchands qui n'en font qu'à leur tête et la menace grandissante des Puissances de la Ruine ; tout cela dans une région que les Drukharis considèrent comme leur domaine. »
languages.original_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."

traits.locale_text: « Grâce à votre prédécesseure. J'étais venu dans les Étendues de Koronus à la demande du conclave de la Flotte de la Connaissance pour mettre fin à l'hérésie de l'archimagos Amarnat. Toutefois, j'ai vite réalisé que les problèmes du secteur ne venaient pas de la technohérésie, mais avaient des causes bien plus profondes. La piraterie qui a pris une ampleur sans précédent, la contrebande flagrante de xéno-artefacts, des libres-marchands rebelles hors de contrôle et le culte grandissant des Puissances de la Ruine ; tout cela dans une région que les Drukharis considèrent comme leur domaine. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Gracias a su predecesora. Llegué a la Extensión en respuesta a la llamada de la Flota Exploradora para poner fin a la herejía del Archimagos Amarnat. No obstante, no tardé en comprender que los problemas de la Extensión de Koronus iban mucho más allá de la tecnoherejía: una piratería rampante sin precedentes, el contrabando descarado de xenoartefactos, Comerciantes Independientes tercos e impulsivos y la amenaza creciente de los Poderes Ruinosos... todo ello en una región que los Drukhari consideran dominio suyo».
languages.original_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a su predecesora. Llegué a la Extensión por solicitud de la Flota Conciencia para lidiar con la herejía del Archimagos Amarnat, pero no tardé en comprender que los problemas de la Extensión de Koronus iban mucho más allá de un episodio de tecnoherejía. Una piratería sin precedentes actuando con total impunidad, tráfico descarado de xenoartefactos, Comerciantes Independientes rebeldes y descontrolados y el culto a los Poderes Ruinosos en aumento constante... y todo esto en una región que los Drukhari consideran suya».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “这要感谢你的前任行商浪人。我遵从真理开拓者舰队的召唤，来到了科罗努斯扩区。我来这里，原本只是为了处理阿玛纳特大贤者的异端行为，可我很快就意识到，科罗努斯扩区面对的问题，远远比普通的技术异端行为严重得多。这里到处充斥着猖獗的海盗、明目张胆的异形造物走私、胡作非为的行商浪人，以及日益壮大的毁灭之力。除此之外，黑暗灵族还把这里当成了他们的猎场。”
languages.original_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."

traits.locale_text: “这要感谢你的前任行商浪人。我遵从真理开拓者舰队密会的召唤，来到了科罗努斯扩区。我来这里，原本只是为了处理阿玛纳特大贤者的异端行为，可我很快就意识到，科罗努斯扩区面对的问题，远远比普通的技术异端行为严重得多。这里到处充斥着猖獗的海盗、明目张胆的异形造物走私、桀骜不惯的流氓商人，以及日益壮大的毁灭之力。除此之外，黑暗灵族还把这里当成了他们的领地。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Dank Eurer Vorgängerin. Ich bin auf Befehl der Exploratorflotte in die Ausdehnung gekommen, um der Ketzerei von Erzmagos Amarnat ein Ende zu bereiten. Ich bin jedoch schnell zu der Erkenntnis gekommen, dass die Koronus-Ausdehnung sehr viel gravierende Probleme hat als bloße Tech-Ketzerei. Zügellose Piraterie in noch nie da gewesenen Ausmaßen, unverhohlener Schmuggel von Xeno-Artefakten, die sturen und ungestümen Freihändler und die wachsende Gefahr durch die Mächte der Zerstörung — all das in einer Region, die die Drukhari als ihr Reich ansehen."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."

traits.locale_text: "Dank Eurer Vorgängerin. Ich war auf Geheiß der Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte in die Ausdehnung gekommen, um der Ketzerei des Erzmagos Amarnat Einhalt zu gebieten. Ich bin jedoch schnell zu der Erkenntnis gekommen, dass die Koronus-Ausdehnung sehr viel gravierende Probleme hat als ein wenig bloße Tech-Ketzerei. Zügellose Piraterie in noch nie da gewesenen Ausmaßen, unverhohlener Schmuggel von Xeno-Artefakten, die rebellischen und wilden Freihändler und der wachsende Kult der Mächte der Zerstörung — all das in dem Land, das die Drukhari als ihr Reich ansehen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「あなたの前任者には感謝している。私は大賢人アマルナトの異端に対処するため、探索艦隊の招集に応じてエクスパンスに到着した。しかし、ほどなくしてコロヌス・エクスパンスの問題は、技術的な異端よりもはるかに深いものであることに気がついたのだ。前代未聞の海賊行為の横行、あからさまな異種族のアーティファクトの密輸、自由奔放で衝動的な自由開拓者、増大する禍つ神々の教団の脅威。これらすべてが、デュカーリが自分たちの領地だと考えている地域にあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの前任者には感謝している。私は大賢人アマルナトの異端に対処するため、探索艦隊の招集に応じてエクスパンスに到着した。しかし、ほどなくしてコロヌス・エクスパンスの問題は、技術的な異端よりもはるかに深いものであることに気がついたのだ。前代未聞の海賊行為の横行、あからさまな異種族のアーティファクトの密輸、自由奔放で衝動的な自由開拓者、増大する禍つ神々の教団の脅威。これらすべてが、デュカーリが自分たちの領地だと考えている地域にあるのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Selefin sayesinde. Enginlik'e Keşiftör Filosu'nun çağrısı üzerine Başmagos Amarnat'ın kâfirliğiyle ilgilenmek amacıyla geldim. Fakat kısa süre içinde Koronus Enginliği'nin sorunlarının tekno kâfirlikten daha derin olduğunu fark ettim. Benzersiz çılgınca bir korsanlık, zeno eserleri kaçakçılığı, inatçı ve fevri Hür Tacirler, yükselen Yıkıcı Güçler tehlikesi... Hepsi Drukharilerin kendi toprakları gördüğü bölgede toplanmış."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to your predecessor. I arrived in the Expanse at the call of the Explorator Fleet to deal with Archmagos Amarnat's heresy. But I quickly came to the realisation that the Koronus Expanse's problems ran much deeper than tech-heresy. Unprecedented piracy running wild, blatant smuggling of xeno-artefacts, wilful and impetuous Rogue Traders, and growing threat of the Ruinous Powers — all this in a region that the Drukhari consider their domain."
